member.name: T:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.ComWrapper.ITemplateContentHandler
member.summary: The COM interface for the ITemplateContentHandler implementation.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.ComWrapper.ITemplateContentHandler.GetBinaryContent
member.summary:
Methods exposing the binary content of a template.
Properties can't be used due to the fact that C# doesn't support ref properties. VB passes its arrays always by reference, so we need a ref parameter here

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.ComWrapper.ITemplateContentHandler.ValidateContent
member.summary:
This method validates the template's content.
If the validation fails, this method needs to raise a TemplateValidationException which subclasses from a LocalizableException.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.ComWrapper.ITemplateContentHandler.ExtractReferences
member.summary: This method retrieves a list of references from the template's content.
member.returns: A list of references in the form of a string array.
member.remarks: The references can be either in the form of Uris or WebDav Urls.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.ComWrapper.ITemplateContentHandler.SubstituteReferences(System.String[]@)
member.summary: This method substitutes the references in the template's content.
member.param: A list of references in the form of a string array.
member.remarks:
The content of a template that is being saved, can contain references to other tridion items. These references can be in the form of Item Uris or a WebDav Urls.
When saving a template: The Tridion Business Layer uses the ExtractReferences method to retrieve a list of references, converts the references to publication independant Uris (tcm:0-12-2048) and then uses the SubstituteReferences method to pass the changed references back to the TemplateContentHandler. The template's content is than saved with publication independant Uris.
When reading a template: The Tridion Business Layer uses the ExtractReferences method to retrieve a list of references, consisting of publication independant Uris. It adds the context publication and uses the SubstituteReferences method to pass the references back to the TemplateContentHandler in the form of a string arry of Uris or WebDav Urls, depending on the XmlReadFilter.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.ComWrapper.ITemplateContentHandler.SubstituteRefTitles(System.String[]@)
member.summary: Substitute the referenced titles in the template's content (if applicable)
member.param: A string array containing the new titles. The array has the same size and order as the one passed in
member.remarks: The content of a template can contain titles of referenced items. When reading a template, the Tridion Business Layer uses the ExtractReferences method to retrieve a list of references. It then calls SubstituteRefTitles to update the reference titles SubstituteReferences to fixup the reference URIs.

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.ComWrapper.ITemplateContentHandler.Content
member.summary: Property exposing the textual content of a template.

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.ComWrapper.ITemplateContentHandler.WebDavUrl
member.summary: Property exposing the webdav url of the organizational item of the template.

member.summary: The COM interface for the TemplateTypeRegistry implementation.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.ComWrapper.ITemplateTypeRegistry.GetListTemplateTypes(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns an Xml string representing a list of template types.
member.param: Tridion item type to filter the list of template types on.
Filter defining what columns will be returned. The following filters are allowed: XmlListID XmlListIDAndTitle XmlListDefault
The LCID of the language in which to retrieve the titles.
member.returns: An Xml string representing a list of template types.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.ComWrapper.ITemplateTypeRegistry.GetTemplateContentHandler(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a template content handler for a specific template type.
member.param: Textual representation of the template type.
Tridion Uri of the template as a string.
member.returns: TemplateContentHandler implementation for a specific template type.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.ComWrapper.ITemplateTypeRegistry.FlushCache
member.summary: Flushes the cached .Net Configuration objects.

member.name: T:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.ComWrapper.TemplateTypeRegistryFacade
member.summary: Com facade from the TemplateTypeRegistry class.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.ComWrapper.TemplateTypeRegistryFacade.GetListTemplateTypes(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns an Xml string representing a list of template types.
member.param: Tridion item type to filter the list of template types on.
Filter defining what columns will be returned. The following filters are allowed: XmlListID XmlListIDAndTitle XmlListDefault
The LCID of the language in which to retrieve the titles. Specify -1 to use the thread's CurrentUICulture.
member.returns: An Xml string representing a list of template types.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.ComWrapper.TemplateTypeRegistryFacade.GetTemplateContentHandler(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a template content handler for a specific template type.
member.param: Textual representation of the template type.
Tridion Uri of the template as a string.
member.returns: TemplateContentHandler implementation for a specific template type.

member.summary: Flushes the internal .Net configuration cache.

member.name: T:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.Legacy.XsltTemplateContentHandler
member.summary: Template Content Handler for (legacy) XSLT Templates.

member.name: T:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler
member.summary: Abstract base class for Template Content Handlers: classes with knowledge about how to find references in template content (for a specific template type).
member.remarks: Note that separate Template Content Handler instances are used for each Template instance. Furthermore, all template content processing for one Template instance is performed on the same Template Content Handler instance. Therefore, Template Content Handler can be implemented in a statefull manner: keeping state across method calls.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler.#ctor(Tridion.ContentManager.TcmUri)
member.summary: Create a new Template Content Handler instance for a given Template.
member.param: The ID (TCM URI) of the Template of which the content should be processed.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler.ValidateContent
member.summary: Validate the template's content.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler.ExtractReferences
member.summary: Extract references to (potential) TCM items from the Template's content.
member.returns: The URIs (either TCM URIs or WebDAV URLs) of potential TCM items.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler.SubstituteReferences(System.String[])
member.summary: Substitute references to TCM items in the Template's content.
member.param: An array of URIs (either TCM URIs or WebDAV URLs) to substitute. The array has the same size and order as the one returned by . Extracted reference which turned out not to point to an existing TCM item will have a null newReference.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler.SubstituteRefTitles(System.String[])
member.summary: Substitute the referenced titles in the template's content (if applicable)
member.param: A string array containing the new titles. The array has the same size and order as the one passed in
member.remarks: The content of a template can contain titles of referenced items. When reading a template, the Tridion Business Layer uses the ExtractReferences method to retrieve a list of references. It then calls SubstituteRefTitles to update the reference titles SubstituteReferences to fixup the reference URIs. The default implementation of this method does nothing. Template Content Handlers for template types that have referenced titles in their content should override this method.

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler.Content
member.summary: Get or set the textual content of the Template.
member.remarks: This property reflects the substituted references after has been called.

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler.BinaryContent
member.summary: Gets or sets the binary content of the Template.
member.remarks: This property reflects the substituted references after has been called.

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler.WebDavUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the WebDAV URL of the Template's container (i.e. the Organizational Item).

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateContentHandler.TemplateId
member.summary: Gets the ID (TCM URI) of the template.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.Legacy.XsltTemplateContentHandler.#ctor(Tridion.ContentManager.TcmUri)
member.summary: Create a new Template Content Handler instance for a given Template Id.
member.param: The ID (TCM URI) of the Template of which the content should be processed.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.Legacy.XsltTemplateContentHandler.ValidateContent
member.summary: Validate the Template's content.
member.remarks: Performs basic validation on the XSLT and validates that all references contain either a TCM URI of a TBB or a WebDAV URL.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.Legacy.XsltTemplateContentHandler.ExtractReferences
member.summary: Extract references to (potential) TCM items from the Template's content.
member.returns: An array of URIs (either TCM URIs or WebDAV URLs) of potential TCM items.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.Legacy.XsltTemplateContentHandler.SubstituteReferences(System.String[])
member.summary: Substitute references to TCM items in the Template's (binary) content.
member.param: An array of URIs (either TCM URIs or WebDAV URLs) to substitute. The number of elements and order of the elements in the array corresponds to the array returned by . Extracted reference which turned out not to point to an existing TCM item will have a null newReference.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.Legacy.XsltTemplateContentHandler.InternalExtractReferences(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Parse the XSLT and extract references.
member.param: Indicates whether the XSLT and reference TCM URIs should be validated.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.Legacy.XsltTemplateContentHandler.AssertValidXslt
member.summary: Raises an exception if the the XSLT isn't valid.

member.summary: Extract references to (potential) TCM items from the Template's content.
member.returns: An array of URIs (either TCM URIs or WebDAV URLs) of potential TCM items.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.Legacy.ScriptedTemplateContentHandler.SubstituteReferences(System.String[])
member.summary: Substitute references to TCM items in the Template's (binary) content.
member.param: An array of URIs (either TCM URIs or WebDAV URLs) to substitute. The number of elements and order of the elements in the array corresponds to the array returned by . Extracted reference which turned out not to point to an existing TCM item will have a null newReference.

member.summary: Get a list of Regex Captures for all references in the Template's content.

member.name: T:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType
member.summary: This class represents a template type
member.remarks: The class is public, internally creatable and exposes read-only properties. Use the TemplateTypeRegistry's TemplateTypes property to access an object of this class.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType.#ctor(Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.Configuration.TemplateType)
member.summary: Internal constuctor, used by the TemplateTypeRegistry to create a TemplateType object
member.param: Configuration type object exposing the collection of template types.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType.GetLocalizedTitle(System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Gets the title (display name) of the template type in a given language.
member.remarks: If no title resource exists for the given language, the standard .NET language fallback mechanism applies.
member.param: The language in which to get the title
member.returns: The title in the given language or the symbolic name if no title resource is configured.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType.AssertInitialized
member.summary: Used to test if the private members have been serialized. This is necessary because the TemplateType class has a parameter-less constructor which doesn't initialize the object. The constructor is required to be serializable.

member.name: M:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType.AssertTemplateType(Tridion.ContentManager.ItemType)
member.summary: Asserts if the type is registered for the template.
member.param: Type of the item.

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType.Id
member.summary: Gets the numeric identifier of the template type.

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType.Name
member.summary: Gets the (symbolic) name of the template type.
member.remarks: This is the symbolic name that is used in the XML representation of a template.

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateType.Title
member.summary: Gets the title (display name) of the template type.
member.remarks: The title is localizable, i.e. it depends on the . To get the title in another language, use . Use the property for a non-localizable, symbolic name (used in XML).

member.summary: Use this indexer to refer to a template type by name.

member.returns: The TemplateType object referred to by the name parameter

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.TemplateTypes.Item(System.Int32)

member.returns: The TemplateType object referred to by the index parameter.

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.WebDavFileExtension.ItemType

member.name: P:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.WebDavFileExtension.FileExtension
member.summary: The file extension that is defined by the item type and template type together.

member.name: T:Tridion.ContentManager.TemplateTypes.WebDavFileExtensions

member.summary: Use this indexer to refer to a WebDavFileExtension by ItemType enum.
